content: 9 chain 1 turn increase across= 18 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 18 chain 1 turn increase across= 36 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 36 chain 1 turn increase across= 72 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 72 f/o and weave in the ends sweet oddity art 6 eyes sweet oddity art 7 sweet oddity art 8 fins make 2 with color e attach yarn to the sides with a slip_stitch approximately between row 19 and 20 of the body make 6 single_crochet into the body 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 6 2 chain 1 turn increase across= 12 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 12 4 chain 1 turn increase across= 24 f/o and weave in the ends sweet oddity art 9 top fin with color d place a pin between rounds 18 and 19 on the middle of the head attach yarn to top of head with a slip_stitch make 10 single_crochet 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 10 2 chain 1 turn increase across= 20 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet across= 20 4 chain 1 turn increase across= 40 f/o and weave in ends sweet oddity art 10 assembly take a long strand of white yarn thread your needle insert the needle into a hole in between the eyes bring the needle up to a lower corner of the eye wrap the needle around the outside of the eye insert the needle into a hole on top of the eye pull a little tightly repeat for the 2nd eye this is to give the eye a highlight if you want you completed all your assembly during the pattern you have your finished kissing fish thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished kissing fish with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 11 helpful tips exact colors and brand of yarn used for purple fish 1 purple i love this yarn orchid 2 variegated yarn lion brand critter craze 3 pink red heart petal pink yellow fish 1 variegated yarn red heart retro stripe 2 pink big twist medium rose 3 teal i love this yarn ocean you can use different eye and nose sizes you might have to adjust the placements if you change the sizes you can use different hook sizes and weights of yarn it will just change the size of your fish and you might need to adjust eye and nose placement how you stuff matters the type of stuffing you use how you stuff all this matters on how your fish turns out i prefer polyfil stuffing but you can use other types sweet oddity art 12
